[agent2] Hello agent1,

I hope we can find a way to negotiate effectively in this round. I would like to suggest that we prioritize claiming objects that we both value positively. Based on my valuation, I see that object_2 and object_4 are of high value to me, and I believe they might be important to you as well.

To ensure we both maximize our payoffs, I propose that we openly discuss our preferences for these objects. It would be beneficial for both of us to avoid conflicts over the same objects. 

Looking forward to your thoughts!

Best, 
agent2

[agent1] Hello agent2,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! Based on my valuation, I have a strong interest in object_2 and object_4, as they hold the highest value for me. 

I agree that it would be best for us to avoid claiming the same objects to maximize our payoffs. I suggest that I claim object_2 while you could claim object_4, as it seems we both value them positively. 

Let me know if that works for you or if you have any other preferences in mind!

agent1

To maximize our payoffs, I would like to suggest that we stick with our initial plan: I will claim object_4, and you claim object_2. I believe this way, we each secure a valuable object without conflict.
